title: Why Coordination Fails Among People Who Agree
summary: Coordination fails among people who agree on values because they're running different models of how the world works.

title: It's not Artificial Intelligence. It's Sparkling Delegation.

title: The SaaS Layer Is Dissolving
summary: The application layer of enterprise software is being restructured by agentic AI. The strategic question is whether you're positioned as a winner or a casualty.
